points.p: Working with Agentic AI and Amazon Web Services (AWS)
Developing scalable AI architectures for real-world deployment
Collaborating on hybrid cloud solutions for intelligent systems
Developing RAG-LLM based approach for extracting sentiment data from PDFs
Integrated quantitative strategies using sentiment data and volatility metrics
Experienced in diffusion modeling methods for unpaired image-to-image translation
Explored the verificability of AI, focusing on transparency and auditability issues in AI models to ensure robust and explainable AI systems
Contributed to Project INDUS, an initiative to develop a Large Language Model (LLM) from scratch, focusing on model architecture, training techniques, and ethical considerations in AI
Identified Bluetooth communication packets with encryption using the BT-HCI protocols and their corresponding opcodes via Pyshark
Developed a Python script for pairing and processing the packets and conducted extensive security audits on different Bluetooth devices
